Reviews.Title: “great location, reasonable price, helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: Lorie22
Reviews.Content: exceptionally clean nicely appointed 6th floor quiet free wifi hotel perfectly placed mitte underground station easy walk museum island potsdamerplatz 80 euros night double reasonable staff pleasant helpful definitely stay probably breakfast included elsewhere starbucks corner

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location”
Reviews.Author: Arlene O
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 29th october 31st october 2011 enjoyed staying hotel excellent location literally round corner check charlie ballon ride berlin wall staff friendly reception restaurant dinner night lovely dinner staff friendly hotel clean warm comfortable environment enjoyed heater fan mini bar selection drinks value money little boyfriend birthday double twin advised double left dissapointment wrote request months ago booking hotel apart hotel holiday recomend hotel thanks time

Reviews.Title: “Does not deserve 4 points rating”
Reviews.Author: stetir
Reviews.Content: bad experience overall conference location central convenient people reception nice positive hotel stayed apartments suites separate internet connection possiblity despite written website internet free lobby restaurant breakfast poor ground floor apt 1 noisy street noisy neighbors waken times middle night somehow bathroom dirty spots fair cookies fridge worst itchy substance linens skin slightly itching evey day soon walked colleague experience allergies lowquality product cleaning overall bit rundown cheap wouldnt

Reviews.Title: “Excellent .. in every way !!!”
Reviews.Author: akinahd
Reviews.Content: reception staff friendly efficient checked quickly clean comfortable dining table bathroom spacious clean facing road noisy breakfast choices location convenient close bahn bus routes linked hot attractions passing front hotel tourist hot spots vicinity visit due preplanned program

Reviews.Title: “Central, but that´s it”
Reviews.Author: Tim_Norway
Reviews.Content: didn´t expect stay lavish location central berlin budget worse expected booked apartment balcony bathtub comforts don´t home arrival apartment looked closed hospital huge insanely ugly decorated tasteless furniture called kitchen sink minibar bathtub expect late night morning hot water response lack hot water run minutes ok 30 minutes letting water run finally wifi connection apartment building effort set network tv reception numerous occasions look response question plugged etc promises look happened breakfast included price costs 650 euro extra worth price basic breakfast boiled eggs resembled scrambled eggs couple occasions cold coffee various hams cheese cereal fruit staff nice pastry freshly baked morning location central short walk checkpoint charlie brandenburger tor museums location close ubahn staff helpful locating map giving tips advice staff 55 wasn´t hot water tv incidents research hotel
